articles.description: There's a big gulf in price, but what about everything else?

articles.title: Microsoft Edge’s new Copilot Mode turns on more AI features - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is launching Copilot Mode in Edge, making its AI assistant your portal to the web. The company is also previewing agentic Copilot Actions and Journeys.

articles.title: Nintendo’s chips let this Lego Game Boy upgrade kit play real cartridges - The Verge
articles.description: Natalie the Nerd, who modded the Lego Game Boy to play actual carts, will sell her mod as a drop-in kit as well as DIY versions.

articles.title: Amazon (AMZN) Sees Another Senior VP Exit from Devices Unit This Month - TipRanks
articles.description: Amazon ($AMZN) is facing its second high-level departure from the devices division this month. Lindo St. Angel, a 15-year veteran and vice president (VP) of hardwar...

articles.title: OpenAI buys Sky, an AI interface for Mac - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications, Inc., the startup behind Sky — an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view your screen and take actions in your apps.
